body:
Just read it, this is all true okay?



On 7/5/14, at 2:20 PM, 26763 (THATS ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW!) wrote:> I know we haven't talked in a long time but...> well this is awkward> but first> ...> LET ME TAKE A SELFIE!!!!! :DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD> wit mah snake
On 7/5/14, at 2:21 PM, JOZZMCOZZ! wrote:> wat xd
On 7/5/14, at 2:21 PM, 26763 (THATS ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW!) wrote:> Itz mah snake's bday> right now> at 2:20 pm [my  time] july 5th> my snake is eating snake treats, xD> like little candy things made for snakes
On 7/5/14, at 2:22 PM, JOZZMCOZZ! wrote:> Lol nice xP
On 7/5/14, at 2:22 PM, 26763 (THATS ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW!) wrote:> OMG> WTF MY SNAKE S*** ON MY TABLE.> WT> WTF
On 7/5/14, at 2:23 PM, JOZZMCOZZ! wrote:> HAHAHAHHAAHHAH
On 7/5/14, at 2:23 PM, 26763 (THATS ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW!) wrote:> OMGOMGOMG WTF> OMG> THERE IS SNAKE S*** ON MY TABLE
On 7/5/14, at 2:23 PM, JOZZMCOZZ! wrote:> bahaha> nub> xd
On 7/5/14, at 2:23 PM, 26763 (THATS ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW!) wrote:> XDDDDDD> THE S*** TOUCHED MY PHONE.> AHHHHH> IT SMELLS> I'm gonnaaaaaa dieeeeee> TELL THE WORLD, HOW I DIED A BEAUTIFUL DEATH> GOOD BYE WORLD> AHHHHHHHHHHH> THE SMELL, ITS TERRIBLEEEEEE
On 7/5/14, at 2:25 PM, JOZZMCOZZ! wrote:> xD
On 7/5/14, at 2:25 PM, 26763 (THATS ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW!) wrote:> OMGOMG> Im srs> it smells> WHAT AM I GONNA DOOOOO> SHould I eat it? xD> xDDD> JKJK> Srsly> WAT> AM> AI> GOiNYA> DOOOOOOOOOOOOO> WAT AM Ai GOinyA DOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
On 7/5/14, at 2:27 PM, JOZZMCOZZ! wrote:> xD
On 7/5/14, at 2:27 PM, 26763 (THATS ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW!) wrote:> Srsly, help me!> What should I do?> Clean it? NOT AN OPTION> THAT IS LIKE COMMITTING SUICIDE> Brb> LEmme just go die first> Then my ghost/spirit me will clean up the s***> BAIIII> *Kills himself*> Okay, I cleaned it, PHEW> You have to post this convo on the forums...

title: OMGOMG
